item.description: Join the Red Sox Natives at the Harp from 8 - 12 am on Friday, December 9 for Harpoon's Annual Holiday Party. Bring an unwrapped toy for Toys for Tots and you get in for free or pay $5.00 cover. There will be specialty beers from Harpoon, raffles, ski prizes, and live music from Radio Riot!. There is a VIP Harpoon hour from 8 - 9 pm with complimentary appetizers for friends of harpoon. Bring your Friend of Harpoon card for an extra raffle ticket and the foh special.  To RSVP please go to the Harpoon Brewery friend of harpoon web site for more information.
item.name: Harpoon Toys for Tots Holiday Party and VIP Hour at the Harp
